typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movies as (genres as string[], rating as short, title as string, year as short)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['output/json/movies.json']) ~> source1
source1 derive(movies = @({genres }=movies.genres,
		rating=movies.rating+1,
		title=movies.title,
		year=movies.year)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 foldDown(unroll(movies.{genres }),
	mapColumn(
		movies = movies.rating,
		genres = movies.{genres }
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
